Subskills.name: Cursed Blades
Subskills.description: Blade barrier has a chance to shoot out a blade when hitting a target.

Subskills.name: Twin Barriers
Subskills.description: Blade barrier now summons an outer and an inner barrier. The inner barrier deals increased damage and the out barrier is guaranteed to proc cursed blades on hit.

Subskills.name: Damascus Steel Blades
Subskills.description: Increases physical damage dealt by blade barrier but reduces arcane damage dealt.

Subskills.name: Infinite Potential
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of blades in the barrier.

Subskills.name: Battle Wounds
Subskills.description: Chance to cause monsters to bleed on hit.

Subskills.name: Spinning Armory
Subskills.description: Adds an additional orbital layer of blades.

Subskills.name: Laceration
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding enemies.

Subskills.name: Sharp Greeting
Subskills.description: Blade barrier deals increased damage to monsters with full life.

Subskills.name: Spirit Fire
Subskills.description: Physical scaling is converted to burning. Blade barrier now only deals arcane damage.

Subskills.name: Forgotten Arts
Subskills.description: Hitting an enemy refreshes blade barrier duration. Gain increased damage for each active blade barrier you have.

Subskills.name: Body And Soul
Subskills.description: Blades seek out and stick on nearby monsters dealing increased damage. Blades return to the player if the target is too far away or the monster dies.
